auth.createAccountSubtitle: Create a new account to use Zikzi
auth.enterCredentialsOrSSO: Enter your credentials or use SSO to continue
auth.noAuthMethods: No authentication methods are configured. Please contact your administrator.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

jobs.title: Print Jobs
jobs.noJobsHint: Set up your printer to start printing
jobs.allJobsAssigned: All jobs are assigned to users
jobs.orphanedJobsDescription: Jobs from unregistered IP addresses that need to be assigned to users

ipAddresses.title: IP Addresses
ipAddresses.description: Register your IP addresses to automatically associate print jobs with your account
ipAddresses.noAddressesHint: Add an IP to automatically link print jobs to your account
ipAddresses.label: Label

add.title: Register New IP Address
add.description: Add an IP address to link print jobs to your account

appearance.title: Appearance
appearance.description: Customize the look and feel of the application

printer.connectDescription: Add a RAW PostScript printer pointing to this server
printer.step2: Add a new printer → TCP/IP or Socket printer
printer.step4: Select drivers that ends with "PS" or other "PostScript" drivers
printer.step5: Register your IP address in the "IP Addresses" tab
printer.automaticSetupDescription: Download a script to automatically configure the printer
printer.macLinuxNote: macOS/Linux: Use IPP auto-discovery or add printer manually
printer.insecureWarningDescription: The printer connection is unencrypted. All print data is transmitted in plaintext over the internet, allowing anyone who can intercept the traffic to see the contents of your documents.
printer.macOSRecommendationDescription: For the best experience on macOS, we recommend using IPP (Internet Printing Protocol). It provides better integration with the system print dialog.
printer.ippConnectDescription: Add an IPP printer for modern OS integration
printer.ippStep2: Add a new printer → IP or Network printer
printer.ippStep4: Select a PostScript or Generic driver
printer.ippAuthDescription: Configure how devices can authenticate with IPP
printer.ippAuthIPDescription: Authenticate automatically using registered IP addresses
printer.ippAuthPasswordDescription: Authenticate using username and password or auth tokens
printer.ippAuthPasswordHint: Use your account password or create an auth token in the "Auth Tokens" page to authenticate print requests.
printer.ippAuthNoneWarning: No authentication methods are enabled. Printing will not be possible via IPP.
printer.allowIPPPasswordDescription: Allow using your account password to authenticate print jobs
printer.ippPasswordDisabledHint: Your password is disabled for IPP. Use authentication tokens from the "Auth Tokens" page instead.
printer.ippCredentialsDescription: Use these credentials when setting up the printer
printer.ippPasswordHint: Use your account password or an auth token
printer.ippPasswordHintTokenOnly: Use an auth token from the Auth Tokens page
printer.noIpRegisteredHint: Register your IP address to link print jobs to your account

profile.title: Profile & Security
profile.yourInfoDescription: Update your display name and email address
profile.changePasswordDescription: Update your password to keep your account secure
profile.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

users.title: Users
users.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}} (@{{username}})? This action cannot be undone.

userDetail.noJobs: No print jobs for this user

ips.title: IP Addresses
ips.addIpDescription: Register an IP address and assign it to a user
ips.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete IP {{ip}}? This action cannot be undone.

tokens.title: Authentication Tokens
tokens.description: Manage IPP authentication tokens for printer access
tokens.noTokensHint: Create a token to authenticate print requests from your devices
tokens.expireDaysHint: Set to 0 or leave empty for tokens that never expire

create.title: Create New Token
create.description: Create a new authentication token for IPP access

created.title: Token Created
created.description: Your new authentication token has been created successfully.
created.warning: Make sure to copy your token now. You won't be able to see it again!
created.usageHint: Use this token as your password when printing. Your username remains the same.

revoke.title: Revoke Token
revoke.confirm: Are you sure you want to revoke this token? It will no longer work for authentication.

delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this token? This action cannot be undone.
